text.tspan: Children who experience violent discipline vs GDP per capita
Percentage of children (2â€“14) who according to self-reports by caregivers, experienced any violent discipline at
home in the past month. Colors represent world regions. Bubble sizes are proportional to the population of the
country. GDP per capita is adjusted for inflation and price differences between countries.
% of children who experience violent discipline
Source: Violent Discipline - UNICEF Global Databases (2016), Data compiled from multiple sources by World Bank
